name: Corporate Funding Direct
overview:
Corporate Funding Direct was founded by Tony Faver in 2007 after working for several mortgage businesses, and then deciding to go into business for himself.

He believes that he has ingenious plan to help all new businesses, and some already established businesses, to rebuild their credit from the rock bottom to the sky high!

Their ideology is to help needy business owners learn to work their credit instead of their credit working them. Their main goal is to help businesses to get all their financial needs for relatively inexpensive prices.

Since 2007, Corporate Funding Direct offers funding solutions to many different types of businesses large or small.
